Package com.augursystems.armi

Class ArmiException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.augursystems.armi.ArmiException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable
    public class ArmiException
extends java.lang.Exception
implements java.io.Externalizable
    Wraps any remote exception; analogous to RMI's RemoteException class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ArmiException()
      Creates a plain exception, with no wrapped message or exception.
      ArmiException​(java.lang.String message)
      Creates a plain exception, with the given message, but no wrapped exception.
      ArmiException​(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable e)
      Creates a plain exception, with the given message, and wrapped exception.
      ArmiException​(java.lang.Throwable e)
      Creates a plain exception, with the given wrapped exception, but no message specific to this ArmiException.
